response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe would greatly benefit you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item for $9,500. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the value it holds for someone like yourself. I understand its worth to you is $8,000, but I hope this offer presents a fair compromise that allows us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 9500}
